full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 61 of 262 1766 LC8VMAX2 Shawn - cross 1 Q. Okay. And then it wasn't until very close to this trial in November that you first said Maxwell was one of these people calling you; correct? 2 A. I'm not sure about that. 3 Q. Okay. Now, you went to some of these meetings with Epstein; correct? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. And at one point I think you thought that you saw Sarah in the driveway; is that correct? 6 A. I did. 7 Q. You never saw, talked to, met, Ms. Maxwell; correct? 8 A. No. 9 Q. And you were getting money, as I understand it, from Carolyn; is that correct? 10 A. I would take money for gas, yes. 11 Q. And you would use the money from Carolyn to buy drugs; correct? 12 A. Correct. 13 Q. And you and Carolyn were using marijuana, cocaine, ecstasy, and other pills during that time period; correct? 14 A. Correct. 15 Q. You left the state of Florida in 2003 to go to Georgia; correct? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. And you were in Georgia for a period of time while Carolyn SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. 1 Q. Okay. And then it wasn't until very close to this trial in November that you first said Maxwell was one of these people calling you; correct? 2 A. I'm not sure about that. 3 Q. Okay. Now, you went to some of these meetings with Epstein; correct? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. And at one point I think you thought that you saw Sarah in the driveway; is that correct? 6 A. I did. 7 Q. You never saw, talked to, met, Ms. Maxwell; correct? 8 A. No. 9 Q. And you were getting money, as I understand it, from Carolyn; is that correct? 10 A. I would take money for gas, yes. 11 Q. And you would use the money from Carolyn to buy drugs; correct? 12 A. Correct. 13 Q. And you and Carolyn were using marijuana, cocaine, ecstasy, and other pills during that time period; correct? 14 A. Correct. 15 Q. You left the state of Florida in 2003 to go to Georgia; correct? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. And you were in Georgia for a period of time while Carolyn
